actions.text: On agreeing to the Blunt Rochester amendment (A052) Agreed to by recorded vote: 376 - 47 (Roll no. 301).
Amendment (A052) offered by Ms. Blunt Rochester.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blunt Rochester amendment (A052) Agreed to by recorded vote: 376 - 47 (Roll no. 301).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A052) offered by Ms. Blunt Rochester.

description: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase and decrease $1 from the Health Resources and Services Administration with respect to the health workforce and health professional staffing shortages.
purpose: Amendment redirects $1 in funding from the Health Resources and Services Administration with respect to the health workforce and health professional staffing shortages.
